full_summary:
### Global Positioning System (GPS) Solution
#### Tender Reference Number: cb-179-67032829
#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)
#### Solicitation Number: SEN- 050 23/24
#### Amendment Number: 8
#### Last Amendment Date: 2024-01-12
#### Tender Closing Date: 2024-01-12T11:00:00
#### Tender Status: Expired
#### Notice Date: 2023-11-20

The Senate of Canada is seeking a contractor to supply, deliver, and install a cloud-based software as a service (SaaS) Global Positioning System (GPS) solution. This system will be used to monitor, track, and locate the Senate's fleet of vehicles in real-time, providing detailed reports and service alerts.

The contract will be for a period of three years, with an option to renew for two additional one-year periods. The contractor's solution must meet the requirements outlined in the annexed Statement of Work.

Interested contractors must submit their proposals by the tender closing date. Enquiries regarding the RFP must be received by email at Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca, no later than December 11, 2023, at 11:00 am EST.

The Senate encourages all contractors to review the RFP and annexed documents carefully before submitting their proposals. Any proprietary information must be clearly marked as such.

To ensure an equal exchange of information among contractors, answers to enquiries will be provided simultaneously to all bidders through the CanadaBuys website.

### Contract Requirements
* Provide a cloud-based SaaS GPS solution
* Monitor and track the Senate's fleet of vehicles in real-time
* Provide detailed reports and service alerts
* Meet the requirements outlined in the annexed Statement of Work

### Bidder Information
* Submit proposals by 2024-01-12T11:00:00
* Enquiries regarding the RFP must be received by Proc-Appr@sen.parl.gc.ca no later than December 11, 2023, at 11:00 am EST
* Proprietary information must be clearly marked as such

### Documents Attached
* Addendum 1
* Addendum 2
* Addendum 3
* Addendum 4
* RFP
* Statement of Work
